entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
